title: ClustExp_StatParse.py
description: Parser for statistical data sets and subject data sets, generating several outputs for further analysis.

table_mean.title: Table with all data extracted from all subjects
table_mean.description: Table with all data extracted from all subjects.

group_table.title: Table with information parsed from the statistics data set history.
group_table.description: Table with information parsed from the statistics data set history.

clusters_output.title: Cleaned up version of the whereami output
clusters_output.description: Cleaned up version of the whereami output.

statinfo_output.title: Summary info for the shiny app
statinfo_output.description: Summary info for the shiny app.

thresholded_dataset.title: A new data set from input statistics, thresholded at uncorrected p value.
thresholded_dataset.description: A new data set from input statistics, thresholded at uncorrected p value.

thresholded_mask_dataset.title: Integer labeled mask of the thresholded image with cluster sizes at least as big as the -MinVox.
thresholded_mask_dataset.description: Integer labeled mask of the thresholded image with cluster sizes at least as big as the -MinVox.

master_copy.title: A NIfTI copy of the master file provided that may have been resampled
master_copy.description: A NIfTI copy of the master file provided that may have been resampled.
